ISebe lezeMpilo leSizwe liyakubulela ngokunceda ukukhusela impilo yabo bonke abemi boMzantsi Afrika. Nqanda ukwanda TB.

This NDoH service only provides health i:
Le nkonzo ye-NDoH inikezela ngolwazi lwezempilo. Nceda uvume unoxanduva lokukhathalela impilo yakho nonyango lwakho

Phendula
Buyela usebenzise le nkonzo nanini na. Khumbula, ukuba ucinga une-TB, kuphephe ukunxibelelana nabanye abantu kwaye uye kuvavanywa kwikliniki ekufutshane nawe.
TB HealthCheck does not replace medical: TB HealthCheck ayithathi ngcebiso zonyango. Fumana ingcebiso engaphezulu kumboneleli wezempilo ofanelekileyo kwimeko yakho yonyango kunye nokunakekelwa.
You use this info at your own risk. This: Sebenzisa olu lwazi ngomngcipheko wakho. Vuma awuzotyeshela okanye ulibazise ukufumana amacebo ngempilo nonyango okanye unonophelo
Your personal information is protected u: Ulwazi lwakho lobuqu lukhuselwe nguMthetho wePOPI kwaye ngokuhambelana nemimiselo yeSaziso seMfihlo seTBHealthCheck esithunyelwe kuwe ngeSMS

This service works best when you select: Le nkonzo isebenza kakuhle xa ukhetha inombolo kuluhlu.
Your replies to the questions show that: Dikarabo tsa hao ho dipotso di bontsha hore o hloka tlhahlobo ea TB bekeng ena.
With early diagnosis, TB can be cured. D:
Ukufunywanwa ngethuba, i-TB inokunyangeka. Ungalibazisi, vavanya namhlanje!

Ndwendwela ikliniki yengingqi yakho ukwenza uvavanyo lwe-TB lwamahala.
Get there early! Clinics are open for TB: Fika kwangexesha! iiKlinikhi zivulwa ukuba ufumane uvavanyo lweTB ngoMvulo ukuya ngoLwesihlanu kusasa.
* Go to a local clinic for a free TB tes:
* Yiya kwiklinikhi yengingqi yakho ukufumana uvavanyo lwamahala lwe-TB.
* Uya kufumana i-airtime ye-R10 ukuba uyazibophelela ukuba uvavanywe.
Well done for committing to your health!: Wenze kakuhle ngokuzibophelela ekunakekeleni impilo yakho!
Even if you can’t commit now, it is stil: Nokuba awukwazi ukuzibophelela ngoku, kusabalulekile ukuba uvavanye.
You don't need a TB test now, but if you: Akudingi vavanyo lwe-TB ngoku, kodwa ukuba ngaba uyakhohlela, unomkhuhlane, uncipha umzimba okanye uyabila ebusuku tyelela iklinikhi ekufutshane nawe.
Check if those you live with are on TB t: Jonga abo uhlala nabo bakunyango lwe-TB na. Ukuba awusazi isimo sakho se-HIV, yiya ekliniki wenze uvavanyo lwasimahla lwe-HIV. Emva koko hlola i-TB kwakhona.
Can I stop halfway through the survey?: Ndithini ukuba ndifuna ukuyeka phakathi kwisaveyi?
Are there costs or risks to me?: Ngaba zikho iindleko okanye iingozi kum?
